text: After Maria is a 2019 American short documentary film directed by Nadia Hallgren and starring Glenda Martes. After Maria follows the families still struggling to pick up the pieces of their shattered life from Hurricane Maria. It was released on May 24, 2019 on Netflix streaming. ==Cast== * Glenda Martes ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2019 documentary films Category:2019 films Category:2019 short films Category:Short documentary films Category:Netflix original documentary films Category:Spanish-language films
title: After Maria
